noUnusedImports.description:
Description

Disallow unused imports.
Unused imports might be the result of an incomplete refactoring.
The code fix can remove comments associated with animport.
See the last invalid example.
Note that the leading trivia, e.g., comments or newlines preceding
the unused imports will also be removed. So that comment directives
like@ts-expect-errorwonâ€™t be transferred to a wrong place.
noUnusedImports.option: This rule respects thejsxRuntimesetting and will make an exception for React globals if it is set to"reactClassic".
